{"type":"user","message":{"role":"user","content":[{"tool_use_id":"call_txvm4g5vqxi","type":"tool_result","content":"     1→
     2→'use client'
     3→import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
     4→import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'
     5→import { Button } from './ui/button'
     6→import { Input } from './ui/input'
     7→import { formatDate, generateId } from '@/lib/utils'
     8→
     9→interface Task {
    10→  id: string
    11→  title: string
    12→  description: string
    13→  completed: boolean
    14→  priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'
    15→  createdAt: Date
    16→  dueDate?: Date
    17→}
    18→
    19→export function TaskManager() {
    20→  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([])
    21→  const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' as const })
    22→  const [filter, setFilter] = useState<'all' | 'active' | 'completed'>('all')
    23→
    24→  useEffect(() => {
    25→    const savedTasks = localStorage.getItem('tasks')
    26→    if (savedTasks) {
    27→      setTasks(JSON.parse(savedTasks).map((task: any) => ({
    28→        ...task,
    29→        createdAt: new Date(task.createdAt),
    30→        dueDate: task.dueDate ? new Date(task.dueDate) : undefined
    31→      })))
    32→    }
    33→  }, [])
    34→
    35→  useEffect(() => {
    36→    localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(tasks))
    37→  }, [tasks])
    38→
    39→  const addTask = () => {
    40→    if (!newTask.title.trim()) return
    41→    const task: Task = {
    42→      id: generateId(),
    43→      title: newTask.title,
    44→      description: newTask.description,
    45→      priority: newTask.priority,
    46→      completed: false,
    47→      createdAt: new Date()
    48→    }
    49→    setTasks(prev => [...prev, task])
    50→    setNewTask({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' })
    51→  }
    52→
    53→  const toggleTask = (id: string) => {
    54→    setTasks(prev => prev.map(task =>
    55→      task.id === id ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed } : task
    56→    ))
    57→  }
    58→
    59→  const deleteTask = (id: string) => {
    60→    setTasks(prev => prev.filter(task => task.id !== id))
    61→  }
    62→
    63→  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(task => {
    64→    if (filter === 'active') return !task.completed
    65→    if (filter === 'completed') return task.completed
    66→    return true
    67→  })
    68→
    69→  return (
    70→    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-6">
    71→      <Card>
    72→        <CardHeader>
    73→          <CardTitle>Add New Task</CardTitle>
    74→        </CardHeader>
    75→        <CardContent className="space-y-4">
    76→          <Input
    77→            placeholder="Task title..."
    78→            value={newTask.title}
    79→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, title: e.target.value }))}
    80→          />
    81→          <Input
    82→            placeholder="Task description..."
    83→            value={newTask.description}
    84→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, description: e.target.value }))}
    85→          />
    86→          <select
    87→            value={newTask.priority}
    88→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, priority: e.target.value as any }))}
    89→            className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm"
    90→          >
    91→            <option value="low">Low Priority</option>
    92→            <option value="medium">Medium Priority</option>
    93→            <option value="high">High Priority</option>
    94→          </select>
    95→          <Button onClick={addTask}>Add Task</Button>
    96→        </CardContent>
    97→      </Card>
    98→      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-4">
    99→        <Button variant={filter === 'all' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('all')}>
   100→          All ({tasks.length})
   101→        </Button>
   102→        <Button variant={filter === 'active' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('active')}>
   103→          Active ({tasks.filter(t => !t.completed).length})
   104→        </Button>
   105→        <Button variant={filter === 'completed' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('completed')}>
   106→          Completed ({tasks.filter(t => t.completed).length})
   107→        </Button>
   108→      </div>
   109→      <div className="space-y-4">
   110→        {filteredTasks.map(task => (
   111→          <Card key={task.id} className={task.completed ? 'opacity-60' : ''}>
   112→            <CardContent className="p-4">
   113→              <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
   114→                <div className="flex-1">
   115→                  <h3 className={`font-medium ${task.completed ? 'line-through' : ''}`}>
   116→                    {task.title}
   117→                  </h3>
   118→                  {task.description && (
   119→                    <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1">
   120→                      {task.description}
   121→                    </p>
   122→                  )}
   123→                  <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mt-2 text-xs text-muted-foreground">
   124→                    <span>Priority: {task.priority}</span>
   125→                    <span>Created: {formatDate(task.createdAt)}</span>
   126→                  </div>
   127→                </div>
   128→                <div className="flex gap-2">
   129→                  <Button
   130→                    variant="outline"
   131→                    size="sm"
   132→                    onClick={() => toggleTask(task.id)}
   133→                  >
   134→                    {task.completed ? 'Undo' : 'Complete'}
   135→                  </Button>
   136→                  <Button
   137→                    variant="destructive"
   138→                    size="sm"
   139→                    onClick={() => deleteTask(task.id)}
   140→                  >
   141→                    Delete
   142→                  </Button>
   143→                </div>
   144→              </div>
   145→            </CardContent>
   146→          </Card>
   147→        ))}
   148→      </div>
   149→    </div>
   150→  )
   151→}
   152→export default TaskManager
   153→

```typescript
  } catch {
    return []
  }
}

```
